overview:
PartnerOption.com is a new social network/social CRM service for businesses. Business professionals can join PatnerOption.com to network with their partners, resellers, customers, suppliers, and other business associates. They can also use this service to announce upcoming events, advertise new products and services, post recent news about themselves or their companies, and advertise resource requirements and job openings for their businesses. In addition to all of those features, PartnerOption offers a user friendly, web based Customer Relationship Management (CRM) application that allows the user to effectively manage their social contacts. Social contacts can be automatically added to the CRM or selectively added later. Users can have multiple CRM accounts that can be shared with user defined permission levels or secured and accessible only to the CRM owner.

Our service has focused its feature set around requirements set by organizations like yours with membership that includes manufacturers, distributors, VARs, independent agents, and sales reps that want to network online, find new partners, and broaden their sales/distribution channel.   2. Manage the connections via an integrated CRM â€“ Create as many CRMs as you require and share them based on an array of specific permissions that you set.

  3. Manage the membership community by creating industry specific groups â€“ Invite members, associates, and partners to join open or private groups.

  4. Provide your membership with the ability to create their own web accessible company profiles â€“ Company profiles can have their own web address and act as web sites for small businesses.
